罭字的基本解释

罭
yù
捕小鱼的密眼网：“九罭之鱼鳟鲂。”

罭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》雨逼切，入職，云。］
捕小鱼的细眼网。通称“九罭”。

罭字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【网字部】　罭； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页948第19
【廣韻】雨逼切【集韻】【正韻】越逼切【韻會】影逼切，?音域。【說文·新附字】魚網也。【爾雅·釋器】緵罟謂之九罭。九罭，魚罔也。【註】今之百囊罟。【詩·豳風】九罭之魚。【傳】九罭，緵罟，小魚之網也。

罭字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
罭字的起名意思

暂无。

dragnet
Basic explanation of words
dragnet
yù
The dense eye net for catching small fishes: "The fish trout bream of the Nine Dragons."
dragnet
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yù］
["Guangyun" rain forcefully, entry, cloud. ]
A fine mesh for catching small fish. Commonly known as "Jiujun".
dragnet
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Net Word Department] 　罭; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: Page 948 Page 19
[Guang Yun] Rain force cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] more force cut [Yun Hui] Shadow force cut,? Vocal range. 【Said Wen·New Attached Words】Fish net also. 【Erya·Release Device】It is called the nine 罭緵罟. Jiu Gang, the fish are not. [Note] Today's Hundred Nang Kou. 【Poetry·Binfeng】The fish of Nine Dragons. [Biography] Jiu 罭,緵緵緵罟, the net of small fish.

сущ. кошель рыболовной сети
